name: Escape The Rooms:The Silent Hotel Escape Games
name_original: Escape The Rooms:The Silent Hotel Escape Games
description:
Alice was awakened by a loud noise. She found that her sister who lived in her room was missing. The parents in the next room also disappeared. The hotel was empty, as if no one had appeared. But the blood stains everywhere in the hotel reminded Alice again and again that something terrible had happened. She had to break through the chambers to find the lost ones, when she finally got out of the hotel,she found the truth.

* Ten carefully designed game levels
* Ten beautiful game scenes.
* It will test your intelligence.
* A horrible Hotel story

Can you help Alice find the truth about the hotel?
